The 10 Levels of ChatGPT Prompts.

Level 1: “Write it.”

Level 2: “Rewrite it in my voice.”

Level 3: “Boil the idea down to its essence.”

Level 4: “Spot the blind spots.”

Level 5: “Argue the exact opposite so I see both sides.”

Level 6: “Rank actions by highest ROI first.”

Level 7: “Design a repeatable workflow I can hand off.”

Level 8: “Stress‑test a workflow under scarce time, money, and data.”

Level 9: “Perform deep research. Find lessons from unrelated fields to discover new angles.”

Level 10: “Pull from your memory of my style, goals, and history. Remember my personality traits. What is the 20% we should focus on to yield 80% of the results?”

Most people never leave Level 1.

I made a blog on "How to prompt": https://lnkd.in/edwXnKRa.

But here's a quick breakdown on how to instantly write better prompts on ChatGPT, for free:

☑ Go to ChatGPT, on the left menu, click GPTs.
☑ Search for "Prompt Maker, Ruben Hassid".
☑ Start using it, and share your (bad) prompt.

The Prompt Maker will rewrite it, but better.
